# AI Future Team 1 - FLL Website

## Project Structure
This website is organized for easy maintenance and collaboration:
- **robot-design/**: All robot-related content and documentation
- **innovation-project/**: Complete innovation project documentation
- **core-values/**: Individual pages for each team core value
- **assets/images/**: Organized image assets with subfolders

## Navigation Guidelines
- Consistent main navigation across all pages
- Section-specific sub-navigation for each main area
- Mobile-responsive design throughout

## Content Organization
Each section has its own landing page and dedicated subsections for easy content management and updates.
